xwikidoc.content:
### Missing: platform.panels.applications.helper=Here, you can select which applications are displayed in the Applications Bar (on the left, by default). Any new application will be displayed there. If you want to remove some of them, you just need to drag and drop the icon from the first box to the other. You can also re-order the applications as you want. Don't forget to save your changes! ### Missing: platform.panels.applications.displayedapps=Applications in the bar ### Missing: platform.panels.applications.blacklistedapps=Applications not in the bar platform.panels.applications.save=保存 platform.panels.applications.revert=重置 ### Missing: platform.panels.applications.ajax.success=The configuration has been saved. ### Missing: platform.panels.applications.ajax.csrf=CSRF validation failed. Try reloading the page. ### Missing: platform.panels.applications.ajax.noright=You do not have the right to edit PanelsCode.ApplicationsPanelConfiguration. ### Missing: platform.panels.applications.ajax.error=Failed to save your change(s). admin.panels.applications=应用面板 ### Missing: admin.panels.applications.description=Manage what applications are displayed in the Applications Panel.
admin.panels.navigation=导航面板 admin.panels.navigation.description=管理导航面板中显示的页面。 ### Missing: PanelsCode.NavigationConfigurationClass_excludeTopLevelExtensionPages=Exclude Top Level Extension Pages ### Missing: PanelsCode.NavigationConfigurationClass_excludeTopLevelExtensionPages.hint=This dynamic filter removes from the navigation tree the top level pages that belong to an installed extension, if they are not meant to be modified. ### Missing: PanelsCode.NavigationConfigurationClass_excludeTopLevelApplicationPages=Exclude Top Level Application Pages ### Missing: PanelsCode.NavigationConfigurationClass_excludeTopLevelApplicationPages.hint=This dynamic filter removes from the navigation tree the top level pages that belong to an application created with App Within Minutes. ### Missing: PanelsCode.NavigationConfigurationClass_exclusions=Exclusions ### Missing: PanelsCode.NavigationConfigurationClass_exclusions.hint=The list of pages to exclude from the navigation tree. ### Missing: PanelsCode.NavigationConfigurationClass_inclusions=Inclusions ### Missing: PanelsCode.NavigationConfigurationClass_inclusions.hint=The list of pages to include in the navigation tree even if they were excluded by a previous filter. ### Missing: platform.panels.navigation.configuration.excludedPages=Excluded Pages ### Missing: platform.panels.navigation.configuration.excludedPages.hint=Use drag & drop to move pages out of the navigation tree or to put them back. ### Missing: platform.panels.navigation.configuration.excludedPages.empty=None ### Missing: platform.panels.navigation.configuration.topLevelExtensionPages=Top Level Extension Pages ### Missing: platform.panels.navigation.configuration.topLevelApplicationPages=Top Level Application Pages ### Missing: platform.panels.navigation.configuration.otherPages=Other Pages ### Missing: platform.panels.navigation.configuration.saveComment=Updated the Navigation Panel configuration from the Administration
